channel.title: AI on A collection of random ideas so I don't have to google again
channel.description: Recent content in AI on A collection of random ideas so I don't have to google again

item.title: Alexa AI for reminding important emails and reminders
item.description: Motivation :- It was the third time I missed reading my email and picking up shifts for my oncampus job. I did try creating labels and filtering them but that didn’t show any progress in improvement. It’s really stressful when I get the notification that something needs a response from me right away. I had to make sure that I was not missing this next time. It is then when I decided I need to build a system to process and remind me this.
